name: RTCRtpReceiver
description: The RTCRtpReceiver interface of the WebRTC API manages the reception and decoding of data for a MediaStreamTrack on an RTCPeerConnection.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
